name: Sanumayaaaa!!!
greetingText: Its your special day so I wanted to try something special..
wishText: Wishing you all the happiness in this world my blueberyy cheesecake :*
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!!! Janmadin ko dherai dherai blah.. blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do suruma..
text3: But then I stopped and realised..
text4: Nahhhh, I wanted to do something much more
text5Content: You are the love of my life <3
outroText: Whatever the life puts us against, I promise to be by your side, fighting together. Hoping to spend the rest of my birthdays with you and making sure to make each one of your birthdays special...
replayText: P.S. ik its not something profound but I wanted to try something different and after hours of scratching my head I came up with this :v Hope you liked it love! Truly Yours - Bunny.
